an4.245:1.1: “Sikkhanisamsamidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati pannuttaram vimuttisaram satadhipateyyam.
an4.245:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam abhisamacarika sikkha pannatta appasannanam pasadaya pasannanam bhiyyobhavaya.
an4.245:1.4: Yatha yatha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam abhisamacarika sikkha pannatta appasannanam pasadaya pasannanam bhiyyobhavaya tatha tatha so tassa sikkhaya akhandakari hoti acchiddakari asabalakari akammasakari, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an4.245:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, maya savakanam adibrahmacariyika sikkha pannatta sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya.
an4.245:2.2: Yatha yatha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam adibrahmacariyika sikkha pannatta sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya tatha tatha so tassa sikkhaya akhandakari hoti acchiddakari asabalakari akammasakari, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an4.245:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam dhamma desita sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya.
an4.245:3.3: Yatha yatha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam dhamma desita sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya tatha tathassa te dhamma pannaya samavekkhita honti.
an4.245:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam dhamma desita sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya.
an4.245:4.3: Yatha yatha, bhikkhave, maya savakanam dhamma desita sabbaso samma dukkhakkhayaya tatha tathassa te dhamma vimuttiya phusita honti.
an4.245:5.2: ‘Iti aparipuram va abhisamacarikam sikkham paripuressami, paripuram va abhisamacarikam sikkham tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami’ti—ajjhattamyeva sati supatthita hoti.
an4.245:5.3: ‘Iti aparipuram va adibrahmacariyikam sikkham paripuressami, paripuram va adibrahmacariyikam sikkham tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami’ti—ajjhattamyeva sati supatthita hoti.
an4.245:5.4: ‘Iti asamavekkhitam va dhammam pannaya samavekkhissami, samavekkhitam va dhammam tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami’ti—ajjhattamyeva sati supatthita hoti.
an4.245:5.5: ‘Iti aphusitam va dhammam vimuttiya phusissami, phusitam va dhammam tattha tattha pannaya anuggahessami’ti—ajjhattamyeva sati supatthita hoti.
an4.245:5.7: ‘Sikkhanisamsamidam, bhikkhave, brahmacariyam vussati pannuttaram vimuttisaram satadhipateyyan’ti,
an4.245:5.8: iti yam tam vuttam idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
